title: 35 more Semgrep rules: infrastructure, supply chain, and Ruby
summary: By Matt Schwager and Travis Peters We are publishing another set of custom Semgrep rules, bringing our total number of public rules to 115.

title: Ideas and Execution
summary: 4 free ideas that Soatok doesn't have the time or energy to execute on.

title: Ultralytics AI Library Hacked via GitHub for Cryptomining
summary: A supply chain attack on Ultralytics exploited GitHub Actions to inject malicious PyPI packages.
